import React from 'react' import "./SignPage.css" import HeaderBottom from '../../HeaderBottom/HeaderBottom' import Button3 from '../../SiteButtons/Button3/Button3' import SiteHeadline from '../../SiteHeadline/SiteHeadline' import { ReduxLoginForm } from '../../Forms/Login/LoginForm' import { ReduxRegisterForm } from '../../Forms/Register/Register' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' const SignPage = (props) => { if (props.isAuth) { return } const onLoginSubmit = (formData) => { props.login(formData.name, formData.email, formData.password) } const onRegisterSubmit = (formData) => { props.register(formData.registerName, formData.registerEmail, formData.registerPassword); } return ( <>
) } export default SignPage
